name: The Woman in the Window
description: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors; only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

review.author: ebookgamer
review.heading: Great movie and acting
review.reviewBody: First... Ignore low reviews from people who read the book. This is a movie! I hate it when people expect a film, lasting under 2 hours, to be similar to the book. Probably 0.001 percent of viewers have or will read the book. It's a film to review. So here goes, it's entertaining. Original, under a genre of Hitchcock. Great acting and clever camera work. Enjoy it. Just don't expect it to be exactly like the book and you'll be entertained. Those reviewers remind me of annoying reviews about a product , giving it one star, and only write about a late delivery! It helps no one.
